timeline.bodyText: I think this is the only one resource (MILESTONE_ICON) which really needs to be provided out-of-the-box, as we're just presetting the milestone node, so maybe other image resrouces can be removed?
timeline.author: romartin

replies.bodyText:
Hey @romartin, I agree. It has been removed.
Thanks
replies.author: handreyrc

timeline.message: KOGITO-2367: BPMN Editor - Support for Milestone (Case Management enablement #1)

timeline.bodyText:
Hey @handreyrc
It looks the preset workitems are being loaded in thtat else clause, which means that only are being loaded if no workitems at all are being declared by the users, is that correct?
I'm poining this out because the milestone should be loaded in case it's not being user defined, so even if the user declares some workitems, but not the milestone one, it has to be anyway included.
Does it makes sanse?
timeline.author: romartin

replies.bodyText:
@romartin, I agree it is better this way. I've already changed the code.
Thanks
replies.author: handreyrc
